screen: Action: MailboxStatus Synopsis: Check Mailbox Privilege: call,reporting,all Description: Checks a voicemail account for status. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) *Mailbox: Full mailbox ID <mailbox>@<vm-context> ActionID: Optional ActionID for message matching. Returns number of messages. Message: Mailbox Status Mailbox: <mailboxid> Waiting: <count>
